A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This looked like a Star Wars film but it sucked my head\, heart and soul dry. I hated the SJW Agendas and pissed me off big time.  Visual effects\, sound design and musical score was good. Most of the deleted scenes in the DVD should have been included in the movie. Ruin Reylo Johnson is an arrogant snobby self righteous novice filmmaker and bad writer. He didn't take risks and gave TFA the middle finger. It is a poorly made film with shallow characters which literally destroyed Legendary Luke Skywalker.  Oh and Leia as Space Jesus...????????????
